name: Do not Mizz
description:
When I was a kid I used to play non-stop the minigame called Pyoro that came with the Wario Ware Inc. game. This is my humble tribute to that one and my submission to the Miziziziz Jam. Hope you have fun.

Note: I was running out of time so the how to play and credits buttons don't work yet.

How to play:

  • Use your Left and Right arrows to move.
  • Use the Space Bar to shoot
  • When your flying charge is full use your Up arrow to fly
  • Luck will automatically activate when the bar is full and destroy all bombs and regenerate platforms.

Cómo jugar:

  • Usa las flechas izquierda y derecha para moverte.
  • Usa la barra espaciadora para disparar.
  • Cuando se llene la carga de volar presionar la flecha arriba para activar vuelo.
  • La suerte se usará de forma automática una vez se llene su barra de carga; desaparecerá las bombas y regenerará el piso

Credits:

  • Inspired by Pyoro
  • Music: Dead Disco by Henry Homesweet
  • Godot I <3 U

Excited to read what you think and checking out your scores.
